title: WenetSpeech-Chuan: A Large-Scale Sichuanese Corpus with Rich Annotation for Dialectal Speech Processing
summary: This paper introduces WenetSpeech-Chuan, a 10,000-hour, richly annotated corpus for Sichuanese dialects, addressing the scarcity of large-scale, open-source data for dialectal speech processing. It also presents the Chuan-Pipeline, a data processing framework, and high-quality evaluation sets.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the paper focuses on creating a 'large-scale corpus' which is a type of 'contextual dataset'. While not directly about spatio-temporal point processes or survey data, the creation and annotation of a specialized dataset aligns with the broader theme of contextual data.
